name: Shadow Realm
dialogs: The shadow portals are multiplying faster than we can close them.
These creatures bring nothing but darkness and despair.
The only way to stop them is to strike at the source - their realm.
You've found another portal! The shadow energy is overwhelming here.
The guardians were strong, but you're making progress.
The Portal Nexus is destroyed! The invasion has been stopped.
The shadow creatures are retreating back to their realm.
